attributes.name: @glimmer/tracking/primitives/cache
attributes.description: Ember uses caching based on trackable values to avoid updating large portions of the application. This caching is exposed via a cache primitive that can be used to cache a specific computation, so that it will not update and will return the cached value until a tracked value used in its computation has updated.

@glimmer/tracking/primitives/cache.name: createCache
getValue
isConst
createCache
getValue
isConst
